sentences.en: 'Look at this filthy grime all over your body.
sentences.cn: “ 你瞧瞧自已身上的这些污垢!

sentences.en: A car's paint collects dirt , grime, bird droppings bugwater deposits , tar, oil and other substances.
sentences.cn: 车漆会沉积赃物, 污垢, 鸟类粪便, 水渍, 油或其他物质.

sentences.en: a face covered with grime and sweat
All limping, all covered in bandages and grime, but alive.
sentences.cn: 所有的跛行, 全部在绷带和尘垢中涵盖, 但是活著的.

sentences.en: Could he offer his oil and grime in exchange for her clean, fresh beauty?
sentences.cn: 他能拿他的油污煤垢去交换她洁净清新的美丽 吗 ?

sentences.en: He emerged with grime on his right sleeve, hip and back.
sentences.cn: 他出现时,右手袖子上 、 臀部和背部都沾满污垢.

sentences.en: His face and hands were coverd with grime from the coal dust.
sentences.cn: 他的脸和双手都沾满了煤灰和污垢.

sentences.en: His face and hands were covered with grime from the coal dust.
sentences.cn: 他的脸和双手沾满了一层煤灰.

sentences.en: His face was covered with grime.
Kelly got the grime off his hands before rejoining her in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 凯利洗去手上的污垢，又回到厨房来帮她的忙。

sentences.en: Look at this filthy grime all over your body.
sentences.cn: 你瞧瞧自已身上的这些污垢!

sentences.en: The walls were black with grime.
sentences.cn: 墙上黑黑的，积满了灰尘。

sentences.en: This perfected, water soluble cream completely removes makeup and grime, without leaving greasy residue.
sentences.cn: 完美的水溶性乳霜,能彻底卸妆及去除尘垢,感觉柔润不油腻.

sentences.en: This prevents scratching and tearing as well as grease and grime build up.
sentences.cn: 这能防止其被刮擦、扯裂并污垢的堆积.

sentences.en: When he examined it, he too saw that it was pure gold under the grime.
sentences.cn: 当他检查那个盘子时, 也发现尘垢下面是个纯金的盘子.
